column4: during an ssh sesstion, I attempted to run xcalc  and i get the error message: X connection to localhost: 10.0 broken (explicit kill or server shutdown.) Anyone know what the problem is?\
you may need to turn on ssh forwarding for X
sorry jordan, i've just been at this... 6 or 7 hours now
getting a bit fustrated at this point
turning on ssh forwarding?
yep
everything says go... accept its not
i think my cygwin isnt doing something right in declareing what screen it wants
you just need to turn on one setting and restart ssh server if it's ubuntu to ubuntu
ssh 555.555.555.555 -l username -X
oh, it might be tricky with cygwin
its supposed to be easy with cygwin

i can do a startX and yes, it will come up with a window
mother ******

and it works
